attributes.action: Give all  U.K. citizens living abroad, same  Pension as resident in the U.K.
attributes.additional_details: We all paid the same deductions why discriminate against us now. And it is mindless discrimination
attributes.background: Give all the U.K. citizens living abroad, who have paid the necessary National Insurance Contributions, to receive the same State Pension payments as those resident in the U.K.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: : https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658063
